attributes.action: Force the FA and Nike to remove the defaced St Georges Cross
attributes.additional_details: Nobody else can if Nike and the FA defend the Chang to the Cross
attributes.background: Force The FA and Nike to remove organ sales of the strip

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the England football kit are a matter for the Football Association, not the UK Government or Parliament.
